languages.text: "Кому я служу и в кого я верю? Только себе и в себя. Может, тебя интересует, кто я по призванию? Хм... Это был бы и впрямь интересный вопрос. Думаю, я — художник". {n}Радостная улыбка озаряет лицо Комиссара.{/n}

"You want to know who I serve or who I believe in? Myself and myself. No one else. Maybe you meant to ask what my calling is? Hmm... That would have been an interesting question indeed. I think I may be an artist at heart." {n}A beaming smile lights up the Commissar's face.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Кому я служу и в кого я верю? Только себе и в себя. Может, тебя интересует, кто я по призванию? Хм... Это был бы и впрямь интересный вопрос. Думаю, я — художник". {n}Радостная улыбка озаряет лицо Комиссара.{/n}

traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: "You want to know who I serve or who I believe in? Myself and myself. No one else. Maybe you meant to ask what my calling is? Hmm... That would have been an interesting question indeed. I think I may be an artist at heart." {n}A beaming smile lights up the Commissar's face.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “你想知道我为谁服务？想知道我相信谁吗？我只为我自己服务，也只相信我自己。或许你想问，我的人生信条是什么？嗯……这确实是个有趣的问题，我猜我内心深处可能是位艺术家。”{n}政委脸上露出了灿烂的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You want to know who I serve or who I believe in? Myself and myself. No one else. Maybe you meant to ask what my calling is? Hmm... That would have been an interesting question indeed. I think I may be an artist at heart." {n}A beaming smile lights up the Commissar's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你想知道我为谁服务？想知道我相信谁吗？我只为我自己服务，也只相信我自己。或许你想问，我的人生信条是什么？嗯……这确实是个有趣的问题，我猜我内心深处可能是位艺术家。”{n}政委脸上露出了灿烂的笑容。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「誰に仕えて、誰を信じているのかって？それはもう、私自身ですよ。それとも私の天職を聞きたかったのですか？ふむ…確かにそれは面白い質問だ。根っからの芸術家なのではないかと自分では思っています」{n}コミッサーは満面の笑みを浮かべて答えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You want to know who I serve or who I believe in? Myself and myself. No one else. Maybe you meant to ask what my calling is? Hmm... That would have been an interesting question indeed. I think I may be an artist at heart." {n}A beaming smile lights up the Commissar's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「誰に仕えて、誰を信じているのかって？それはもう、私自身ですよ。それとも私の天職を聞きたかったのですか？ふむ…確かにそれは面白い質問だ。根っからの芸術家なのではないかと自分では思っています」{n}コミッサーは満面の笑みを浮かべて答えた。{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «¿Quiere saber a quién sirvo o en quién creo? A mí y en mí. Nadie más. A lo mejor pretendía preguntar por mi vocación. Mmm... Eso habría sido interesante. Creo que en el fondo soy un artista». {n}Una sonrisa radiante ilumina el rostro del Comisario.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You want to know who I serve or who I believe in? Myself and myself. No one else. Maybe you meant to ask what my calling is? Hmm... That would have been an interesting question indeed. I think I may be an artist at heart." {n}A beaming smile lights up the Commissar's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Quiere saber a quién sirvo o en quién creo? A mí y en mí. Nadie más. A lo mejor pretendía preguntar por mi vocación. Mmm... Eso habría sido interesante. Creo que en el fondo soy un artista». {n}Una sonrisa radiante ilumina el rostro del Comisario.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "You want to know who I serve or who I believe in? Myself and myself. No one else. Maybe you meant to ask what my calling is? Hmm... That would have been an interesting question indeed. I think I may be an artist at heart." {n}A beaming smile lights up the Commissar's face.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous vous demandez peut-être qui je sers ou en qui je crois ? La réponse à ces deux questions est : moi-même. Personne d'autre. Est-ce que c'est ma vocation qui vous intéresse ? Hmm... Voilà une question intéressante. Moi, je trouve que j'ai l'âme d'un artiste. » {n}Un sourire radieux illumine le visage du commissaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You want to know who I serve or who I believe in? Myself and myself. No one else. Maybe you meant to ask what my calling is? Hmm... That would have been an interesting question indeed. I think I may be an artist at heart." {n}A beaming smile lights up the Commissar's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous demandez peut-être qui je sers ou en qui je crois ? La réponse à ces deux questions est : moi-même. Personne d'autre. Est-ce que c'est ma vocation qui vous intéresse ? Hmm... Voilà une question intéressante. Moi, je trouve que j'ai l'âme d'un artiste. » {n}Un sourire radieux illumine le visage du commissaire.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr wissen, wem ich diene oder an wen ich glaube? Mir und an mich. Sonst ist da niemand. Vielleicht wolltet Ihr fragen, was meine Berufung ist? Hmm ... das wäre in der Tat eine interessante Frage. Ich denke, tief im Herzen bin ich ein Künstler." {n}Ein strahlendes Lächeln erhellt das Gesicht des Kommissars.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You want to know who I serve or who I believe in? Myself and myself. No one else. Maybe you meant to ask what my calling is? Hmm... That would have been an interesting question indeed. I think I may be an artist at heart." {n}A beaming smile lights up the Commissar's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr wissen, wem ich diene oder an wen ich glaube? Mir und an mich. Sonst ist da niemand. Vielleicht wolltet Ihr fragen, was meine Berufung ist? Hmm ... das wäre in der Tat eine interessante Frage. Ich denke, tief im Herzen bin ich ein Künstler." {n}Ein strahlendes Lächeln erhellt das Gesicht des Kommissars.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Kime hizmet ettiğimi veya kime inandığımı mı öğrenmek istiyorsun? Kendime ve yine kendime. Başka kimseye değil. Belki de amacımın ne olduğunu sormak istemişsindir? Hımm... Bu gerçekten de ilginç bir soru. İçten içe bir sanatçı olabilirim ya." {n}Komiser'in yüzü, bir gülümsemeyle aydınlanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You want to know who I serve or who I believe in? Myself and myself. No one else. Maybe you meant to ask what my calling is? Hmm... That would have been an interesting question indeed. I think I may be an artist at heart." {n}A beaming smile lights up the Commissar's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kime hizmet ettiğimi veya kime inandığımı mı öğrenmek istiyorsun? Kendime ve kendime. Başka kimseye değil. Belki de amacımın ne olduğunu sormak istemişsindir? Hımm... Bu ilginç bir soru olurdu gerçekten de. Sanırım ben içten içe bir sanatçı olabilirim." {n}Komiser'in yüzü bir gülümsemeyle aydınlanıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
